title: Mindelo Music Festival
description: The largest open-air music festival in Cape Verde.

title: Local Art Exhibition
description: Local artists present their latest works.

title: Crafts Fair
description: Artisan products and typical Cape Verdean cuisine.

title: Morna Concert
description: Performance by renowned morna and coladeira musicians.

title: Theater Festival
description: Theater companies present contemporary and traditional plays.

title: Traditional Dance Meeting
description: Folklore groups from various islands perform.

title: Gastronomic Week
description: Presentation of national dishes by local restaurants and the Kavala Fresh Festival

title: Film Festival
description: Screening of Cape Verdean and international films.

title: Lecture on Local History
description: Historians share research on the city

title: Photographic Exhibition
description: Photographers capture the essence of life in Cape Verde.

title: Festival de Música Eletrônica
description: DJs and producers liven up the night with electronic music.

title: Feira do Livro
description: Editoras e autores apresentam lançamentos e obras clássicas.

title: Show de Humor
description: Comediantes apresentam espetáculos divertidos para toda a família.

title: Festa de Ano Novo
description: Celebração de Ano Novo com música, dança e fogos de artifício.
